content.prompt: Construct a program that swaps pairs of adjacent elements of the array. For example, if the array is {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}, the program will change it to {2, 1, 4, 3, 6, 5}.\nThis program assumes that the array has always an even number of elements.
